home.save_instant: Save and see your changes instantly.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.about_text: I am a passionate developer creating amazing web solutions.

project.project1_desc: Photo gallery application. The site allows uploading and downloading photos, liking photos, downloading data as an archive and viewing random photos from the list. Added simple login/password authorization:123
project.project1_tech: React 18, Express, Multer, Archiver js, Fs-extra
project.project2_desc: Portfolio application. The site contains sections 'About me', 'Projects', 'Contacts' and a blog. The interface supports English and Russian languages and includes simple animations when navigating between pages.
project.project2_tech: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, i18next, react-i18next, CSS Modules, Jest, Testing Library
project.project3_desc: Display of news cards with infinite scroll
project.project4_desc: Animated display of a product with its characteristics and a smooth transition
project.project6_desc: The project implements all CRUD principles. Data is stored in localStorage, there's mobile adaptation
project.project7_desc: Shows a list of tasks where you can add tasks, mark them as done, sort and search

about.about: I’m a Frontend Developer with a strong focus on interface quality and user experience. I have commercial experience working in productive teams, successfully solving tasks using React and TypeScript, integrating with REST APIs, and managing complex state with Redux Toolkit. I quickly adapt to new technologies, independently study best practices, and explore backend infrastructure to better understand the full system. I can design component architecture with an emphasis on reusability and scalability, and I’m not afraid to take responsibility for critical parts of the project. In my work, I value clarity, attention to detail, and an engineering mindset. I strive not only to implement business logic but also to improve developer experience, codebase quality, and team processes.

resume.title: Frontend Developer
resume.job1_about: The company develops a personal account for a bookmaker, maintaining and creating new features
resume.job1_point1: Developed new features for the personal account: implemented a terminology page and added timezone selection with automatic detection for different user scenarios.
resume.job1_point2: Performed responsive cross-browser layout in React (TypeScript) using Tailwind CSS, integrating the frontend with a Java/PostgreSQL backend via REST API with limited documentation.
resume.job1_point3: Worked with an external designer: assigned tasks, clarified designs and monitored UI implementation.
resume.job1_point4: Participated in project migration from class-based React components and legacy Redux to a modern component approach with Redux Toolkit, unifying the application structure.
resume.job1_point5: Introduced unit testing with Jest (coverage 10–20%), refactored and optimized the architecture.
resume.job1_point6: Took part in discussions of architectural and process decisions, collaborated closely with backend developers and the customer, suggesting improvements to increase project stability and maintainability.
resume.job1_tech: React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, Jest, Webpack, Rollup, Java, PostgreSQL
resume.job2_about: The company develops and maintains medical information systems (MIS) and creates automated workstations (ARM)
resume.job2_point1: Developed a promo website on Vue 3 with TypeScript: created dynamic forms, sent data to the backend, implemented fluid and responsive layout.
resume.job2_point2: Integrated ejs for dynamic generation of medical protocols and reports: designed and implemented templates, exported documents, integrated with Angular/Material UI.
resume.job2_point3: Maintained a personal account on Angular adding functionality: bug fixes, new scenarios, interface improvements.
resume.job2_point4: Created SPA prototypes from scratch (similar to ARM) with React (TypeScript): interactive forms, authentication, API interaction, architecture design, added unit testing with Jest.
resume.job2_point5: Developed a tablet application: electronic queue, integration with the backend via WebSocket, event handling, ensuring stable real-time work.
resume.job2_point6: Wrote and maintained docker-compose configurations for local development and deployment.
resume.job2_point7: Supported and improved legacy projects on jQuery and PHP: optimized code, adapted interfaces for specific devices, fixed bugs.
resume.job2_point8: Worked with documentation and administration (Laravel/Blade, Tomcat deployment).
resume.job2_tech: React, TypeScript, Vue3, Angular, PHP, jQuery, Docker,  Oracle, PostgreSQL
